CustomField.formula: IF(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Billing_360_Transaction__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Billing_Ann_Date__c)), Billing_Ann_Date__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.Next_Recurring_Bill_Date__c)), NOT( ISBLANK(Derived_Next_Bill_Date__c) ) , SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.CloseDate > SBQQ__Account__r.Next_Recurring_Bill_Date__c) , Derived_Next_Bill_Date__c, IF(NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__Account__r.Next_Recurring_Bill_Date__c)), SBQQ__Account__r.Next_Recurring_Bill_Date__c, NULL))), NULL)
CustomField.label: Next Recurring Bill Date
